description: Converts a Probestream into Message Properties. In addition to the defined properties below it sets the properties 'routername', 'probename' and 'time'

properties.name: probename
properties.label: Probe Name
properties.description: This name is set as message property 'probename'.

properties.name: properties
properties.label: Properties
properties.description: Provide the names of the properties you want to set in the order of the values of the Probestream.
